name: Dodge (itch) (Shlobus, i guess)
description:
This game is all about Dodging things! The only thing to dodge right now is one level but I will be adding more in the future . :D This game was also heavily inspired by the Brackey's "How to make a Game" Series, so this isn't entirely all my code. Also yes, I know the banner and the game look nothing alike.

Use arrow keys or AD for movement.

UPDATES: Version 0.3
  • Created First Level
  • Added Smooth transitions
Version 0.3.1
  • Added Levels 2 through 10
  • All text have a new font
  • Small tutorial on the first level
